event.title: 4 February 1975, an earthquake measuring 7.3 on the Richter Scale hit

data.event: On 4 February 1975, an earthquake measuring 7.3 on the Richter Scale hit the city of Haicheng, which at the time had approximately 1 million residents.

event.title: warnings about this earthquake a day earlier

data.event: However, seismologists sent out warnings about this earthquake a day earlier and ordered evacuations.
